it.luca.TwitterFilter.core

Class Twitter4JStreamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.luca.TwitterFilter.core.Twitter4JStreamer

  • public class Twitter4JStreamer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows users to search Tweets that match the message pattern given in input
    Author:
    lucafornelli

      static boolean checkPostPerSecondAverage()
      This method manages the numbers of tweets that will be displayed.
      static void filteredSearch(java.lang.String[] filter)
      This method filters the tweetws stream and returns all the tweets which text match at least one of the filter words.

    • Method Detail

      • filteredSearch

        public static void filteredSearch(java.lang.String[] filter)
        This method filters the tweetws stream and returns all the tweets which text match at least one of the filter words.
        Parameters:
        filter: - words used for filtering tweets stream

      • sampleSearch

        public static void sampleSearch()
        This method returns random tweets. It will be called when not any word is specified in the properties file

      • checkPostPerSecondAverage

        public static boolean checkPostPerSecondAverage()
        This method manages the numbers of tweets that will be displayed. It checks if the limit of max number of tweets per second is reached
        Returns:
        true: if the limit isn't reached, else it returns false.
